title: Новая жизнь
overview: As part of the transformation show, a team of experts will travel to Russian cities to find families who want to radically change their lives. Experts will work in all directions - from apartment renovation to the transformation of the participants-keepers of the hearth. Real professionals got down to business: TV presenter Tatyana Arno, stylist Katya Gershuni, architect Andrei Karpov and plastic surgeon Andrei Iskornev.
